name: tradier
description: Tradier, Inc. (tradier.com) is a financial services cloud provider that offers a groundbreaking solution to serve platform providers, developers and investors. The Tradier solution features an innovative set of fully hosted APIs, modules and out of the box tools that are leveraged by a growing list of providers.
